	== basic process ==
		1) ~~gitaddcommit~~(adds and commit together)
		2) ~~git push~~
	* online log - ~~gitlog~~
	* verbose log - ~~git log~~
	* undo changes - ~~git reset [code on gitlog]
	* get status - ~~git status~~
	* git branches - ~~git branch~~
	* create new branch - ~~git branch [name] (-m [oldname] [newname], -d [branch to delete]{-D to force})~~
	* switch branch - ~~git checkout [other branch]~~
